about_the_game:
The hall stinks of rot and decay. You feel the gaze of countless horrors as you enter the room, each thrice your size. You pause only for a moment to ready your wand, before unleashing a barrage of eldritch obliteration. One by one, you fell the beasts. In a chest across the room you spot your prize: a horde of gleaming hexes, rife with arcane energy.

Hex of the Lich is a turn-based dungeon-crawler roguelike with a twist- Spellcrafting!

  • 80+ Spells to learn and master
  • Spells are built of hexes and super customizable
  • 60+ Effects that upgrade spells, including lasers, explosions, chain lightning, buffs, curses, and more
  • Summon tentacles, robots, and undead horrors
  • Unlock more powerful spells as you delve deeper

Can you break the Hex of the Lich?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

short_description: Hex of the Lich is a spellcrafting turn-based roguelike. Forge spells from hexes and find new ones along the way. Gain powerful artifacts that enhance your abilities. Clear dungeons filled with bouncing robots, eldritch horrors, and otherworldly invaders. Can you face the Lich?
